sentences.en: 'I am in my seventy - eighth year.'
sentences.cn: “ 我七十八岁了. ”

sentences.en: And this whole note obviously can be subdivided into two half notes and each of the half notes into two quarter notes each of these quarter notes into two eighth notes, and so on.
sentences.cn: 这个全音符,很明显,可以再分为两个半音符,每个半音符又可以再细分为两个四分之一音符,每个四分之一音符可以再分为两个八分之一音符,等等

sentences.en: But the eighth most-important invention of all time?
sentences.cn: 真的是整个时代第八项最重要的发明吗？

sentences.en: By the ninth hour the car was running in eighth position.
sentences.cn: 到第9个小时的时候，这辆车位列第8。

sentences.en: Curb Your Enthusiasm begins its eighth season on HBO in July, and once again Larry faces his old adversary: the universe.
sentences.cn: 《克制你的热情》在七月份由HBO开始其第八季的拍摄，而且拉里再次遭逢其老对手—宇宙。

sentences.en: He assumed command of the Eighth Army.
sentences.cn: 他统率着第八军.

sentences.en: He put in a spurt at the beginning of the eighth lap.
sentences.cn: 他进入第八圈时便开始冲刺.

sentences.en: He was the eighth to break the record.
sentences.cn: 他是打破该纪录的第八人.

sentences.en: her eighth birthday
sentences.cn: 她的8岁生日

sentences.en: His eighth book came out earlier this year and was an instant best-seller.
sentences.cn: 他的第8本书在今年早些时候面世，迅速成为了畅销书。

sentences.en: His members in Eighth Army was very colorful.
sentences.cn: 他的第八军团组成分子非常复杂.

sentences.en: I have nominated Brigadier de Guingand as Chief of Staff Eighth Army.
sentences.cn: 我已经委派德圭因甘德准将担任第八集团军参谋长.

sentences.en: I might do an eighth book for charity, a kind of encyclopaedia of the world so that I could use all the extra material that's not in the books ... we'll see!
sentences.cn: 我可能出于慈善的目的写第八本书，大概是有关这个世界的百科全书，这样我可以使用书中没能出现的所有额外材料······敬请期待！

sentences.en: I want that made very clear right down through the Eighth Army.
sentences.cn: 我要求使第八集团军从上到下都明白这一点.

sentences.en: in the eighth century
sentences.cn: 在8世纪

sentences.en: On my eighth day at Bastion, preparing to leave, I witness one last trauma. A British soldier is brought in by Chinook and transferred to the operating room, his lower right leg blown off by an IED.
sentences.cn: 到达基地的第八天，我正准备离开，目击了最后一件让人心碎的场景，一架支努干送来一名英国士兵，转移他到手术室做手术，他的右小腿被简易炸弹炸飞。

sentences.en: On the eighth day of Christmas.
sentences.cn: 在圣诞节的第八天。

sentences.en: Please follow me. Your seat is on the sixth row, the eighth seat from the aisle.
sentences.cn: 请跟我来。您的座位在第六排，是从过道数过去的第八个位子。

sentences.en: The eighth at Banff is one of the world's great golf holes.
sentences.cn: 班夫的第8高尔夫球洞是世界上最棒的高尔夫球洞之一.

sentences.en: The eighth commandment is "Thou shalt not steal".
sentences.cn: 第八诫是“不可偷盗”。

sentences.en: The Kuban produces an eighth of Russia's grain, meat, and milk.
sentences.cn: 库班河流域出产俄罗斯1/8的谷物、肉类和牛奶。

sentences.en: The palace has been described as the eighth wonder of the world.
sentences.cn: 这座宮殿已被誉为世界第八大奇观.

sentences.en: The play is open to all seventh and eighth graders.
sentences.cn: 所有七、八年级的学生均可观看此剧。

sentences.en: Then, in eighth or ninth grade, I studied astronomy, cosmology, and the origins of the universe.
sentences.cn: 后来，在八、九年级的时候，我在学习天文学，宇宙学和宇宙的起源。

sentences.en: There was a peaceful pitch invasion after Milan's eighth goal.
sentences.cn: 米兰队攻入第八粒进球后，观众有序地涌进球场。

sentences.en: This will be his eighth title bout in 19 months.
sentences.cn: 这将是他19个月里的第8次卫冕赛。

sentences.en: Until then, students could leave after the eighth grade, and a lot of them did.
sentences.cn: 那时，学生上完八年级就可以辍学，许多学生的确这样做了。

sentences.en: When her eighth child was still an infant, she became pregnant again.
sentences.cn: 当她第八个孩子还是小婴儿的时候，她又怀孕了。

trans.tran_en: coming after seven other things in a series
one of eight equal parts of something
one of eight equal parts of something
